resources.string: Log on to Office 365 through Azure Active Directory
In keeping up with Contoso’s commitment to educational excellence and investment on youth, we’re expanding our Back to School campaign from K-12 students to college students this year.

Client ID for this application in Azure AD
Redirect URI for this application in Azure AD

This sample requires an existing site on SharePoint Online and a configured client application in the Microsoft Azure account associated with the Office 365 subscription used for the SharePoint site. The full set of app settings will be derived from the data entered above. To review the full set, tap the settings button in the menu bar.
Create Application in Azure Active Directory

If you are tenant admin for the Office 365 subscription, you can push the button to create an app in Azure AD. If you prefer you can configure the App in Azure AD manually and enter Client ID and Redirect Url below.
